In Hunt The Wumpus, your goal is to go through the dungeon, discover where the gold is, and take it to the exit.
 You will start on the exit, and the rest of the dungeon will be dark (you can't see what you have in front of you). The dungeon is full of danger like wells (if you step into one, you will fall and die), and there is also the Wumpus (a fearsome monster that will kill you if you run into its location).
 As you walk trough the dungeon, you will perceive the dangers around you. You can fell a breeze when there is a well near by, or you can smell the Wumpus. You can also see a glow when you are close to the gold, so pay attention!
 You can shoot an arrow (if you have any) to try to kill the Wumpus, but don't waste your ammunition...
